trans-unit.target: Actualmente, solo puedes obtener "Now Playing" de Apple Music porque es una llamada nativa al sistema sin la integración de componentes de terceros. trans-unit.id: If none of the above helped, then the problem is that your Widgy reached the miserly small iOS memory limit. Try hiding some of the image and symbol layers and checking out if the widget now loads on the Home screen. If that helped, now you at least know the cause of the problem.
trans-unit.source: If none of the above helped, then the problem is that your Widgy reached the miserly small iOS memory limit. Try hiding some of the image and symbol layers and checking out if the widget now loads on the Home screen. If that helped, now you at least know the cause of the problem.
trans-unit.target: Si nada de lo anterior ayudó, entonces el problema es que su Widgy alcanzó el mísero límite de memoria de iOS. Intente ocultar algunas de las capas de imágenes y símbolos y compruebe si el widget ahora se carga en la pantalla de inicio. Si eso ayudó, ahora al menos conoces la causa del problema.

trans-unit.id: If sync seems to hang, wake up your Watch, so Watchy is visible on screen.
trans-unit.source: If sync seems to hang, wake up your Watch, so Watchy is visible on screen.
trans-unit.target: Si la sincronización parece bloquearse, active su reloj para que Watchy esté visible en la pantalla.

trans-unit.id: If that doesn't help, try restarting your device a couple of times.
trans-unit.source: If that doesn't help, try restarting your device a couple of times.
trans-unit.target: Si eso no ayuda, intenta reiniciar tu dispositivo un par de veces.

trans-unit.id: If you are wondering why the live timer updates every second, but not anything else, it's because Apple provided that one feature as an exception. Widgy is using that feature as time since 0:00 (24 hour time) or 12:00 am/pm (12 hour time).
trans-unit.source: If you are wondering why the live timer updates every second, but not anything else, it's because Apple provided that one feature as an exception. Widgy is using that feature as time since 0:00 (24 hour time) or 12:00 am/pm (12 hour time).
trans-unit.target: Si se pregunta por qué el temporizador en directo se actualiza cada segundo, pero nada más, es porque Apple proporcionó esa característica como excepción. Widgy está utilizando esa función como hora desde las 0:00 (hora de 24 horas) o las 12:00 am/pm (hora de 12 horas).

trans-unit.id: If you encounter an error during sync, just try again—it often resolves itself.
trans-unit.source: If you encounter an error during sync, just try again—it often resolves itself.
trans-unit.target: Si encuentras un error durante la sincronización, simplemente inténtalo de nuevo; a menudo se resuelve solo.

trans-unit.id: If you'd like to use the new iOS 17 widget reload, which doesn't open the Widgy app, make sure that 'Widget Action' is set to 'Reload Widget' or 'Button', 'Vibrate' is either set to 'No' or 'Yes', and 'External Action' is set to 'Return To Home Screen'. Also, this won't work on Live Activities and Dynamic Island.
trans-unit.source: If you'd like to use the new iOS 17 widget reload, which doesn't open the Widgy app, make sure that 'Widget Action' is set to 'Reload Widget' or 'Button', 'Vibrate' is either set to 'No' or 'Yes', and 'External Action' is set to 'Return To Home Screen'. Also, this won't work on Live Activities and Dynamic Island.
trans-unit.target: Si deseas utilizar la nueva recarga de widgets de iOS 17, que no abre la aplicación de Widgy, asegúrate de que 'Acción del Widget' esté configurado en 'Recargar Widget' o 'Botón', 'Vibración' esté configurado en 'No' o 'Si', y 'Accionarial Externa' esté configurado en 'Volver a pantalla de inicio'. Además, esto no funcionará en Actividades en Directo y Dynamic Island.

trans-unit.id: If you'd like to use the new iOS 17 widget reload, which doesn't open the Widgy app, make sure that 'Widget Action' is set to 'Reload Widget' or 'Button', 'Vibrate' is either set to 'No' or 'Yes', and 'External Action' is set to 'Return To Home Screen'. Also, this won't work on Live Activities, Dynamic Island and PiP Buttons.
trans-unit.source: If you'd like to use the new iOS 17 widget reload, which doesn't open the Widgy app, make sure that 'Widget Action' is set to 'Reload Widget' or 'Button', 'Vibrate' is either set to 'No' or 'Yes', and 'External Action' is set to 'Return To Home Screen'. Also, this won't work on Live Activities, Dynamic Island and PiP Buttons.
trans-unit.target: Si quieres usar la nueva recarga de widgets de iOS 17, que no abre la app Widgy, asegúrate de que la “Acción del Widget” esté configurada en “Recargar Widget” o “Botón”, que “Vibrar” esté en “No” o “Sí”, y que la “Acción Externa” esté en “Volver a la pantalla de inicio”. Además, esto no funciona con Actividades en Vivo, Isla Dinámica ni botones PiP.

trans-unit.id: If you're using non-asynchronous Javascript you must implement 'func main()' to return value to Widgy.
trans-unit.source: If you're using non-asynchronous Javascript you must implement 'func main()' to return value to Widgy.

trans-unit.id: This is a long known iOS bug, but there's a fix for it. Just go to the 'Settings' tab in Widgy, tap on 'App Icon' and pick any icon you want. This will force iOS to reload the widget list and make Widgy visible.

trans-unit.id: To make returning to Watchy simpler, Watchy offers complications (Apple Watch Face 'Widgets') of all sizes that just lead you back to the Watchy app. So after adding those complications to your stock Watch Face, in the worst case you're a tap away from Watchy.
trans-unit.source: To make returning to Watchy simpler, Watchy offers complications (Apple Watch Face 'Widgets') of all sizes that just lead you back to the Watchy app. So after adding those complications to your stock Watch Face, in the worst case you're a tap away from Watchy.
trans-unit.target: Para simplificar el regreso a Watchy, Watchy ofrece complicaciones ('Widgets' de Apple Watch Face) de todos los tamaños que simplemente lo llevan de regreso a la aplicación Watchy. Entonces, después de agregar esas complicaciones a tu Watch Face original, en el peor de los casos estás a un toque de Watchy.

trans-unit.id: To make returning to Watchy simpler, Watchy offers complications (Apple Watch Face 'Widgets') of all sizes, that just lead you back to Watchy app. So after adding those complications to your stock Watch Face, in the worst case you're a tap away from Watchy and custom 'Watch Faces'.
trans-unit.source: To make returning to Watchy simpler, Watchy offers complications (Apple Watch Face 'Widgets') of all sizes, that just lead you back to Watchy app. So after adding those complications to your stock Watch Face, in the worst case you're a tap away from Watchy and custom 'Watch Faces'.
trans-unit.target: Para simplificar el regreso a Watchy, Watchy ofrece complicaciones ('Widgets' de Apple Watch Face) de todos los tamaños, que simplemente lo llevan de regreso a la aplicación Watchy. Entonces, después de agregar esas complicaciones a tu Watch Face original, en el peor de los casos estás a un toque de Watchy y de los 'Watch Faces' personalizados.

trans-unit.id: While widgets can't be natively transparent, you can place a special 'Transparent widget' image on the bottom layer of your widget.
trans-unit.source: While widgets can't be natively transparent, you can place a special 'Transparent widget' image on the bottom layer of your widget.
trans-unit.target: Aunque los widgets no pueden ser nativamente transparentes, puedes colocar una imagen especial de 'widget transparente' en la capa inferior de tu widget.

trans-unit.id: While widgets can't be natively transparent, you can place an image on the bottom layer of your widget that is a cropped version of your wallpaper. Widgy has an crop tool that can help you with this.
trans-unit.source: While widgets can't be natively transparent, you can place an image on the bottom layer of your widget that is a cropped version of your wallpaper. Widgy has an crop tool that can help you with this.
trans-unit.target: Aunque los widgets no pueden ser nativamente transparentes, puedes colocar una imagen en la capa inferior de tu widget que sea una versión recortada de tu fondo de pantalla. Widgy tiene una herramienta de recorte que puede ayudarte con esto.

trans-unit.id: Widgets can fetch data every 15 minutes (that includes various things like Battery Status, Weather, Agenda, and Health).

trans-unit.id: Widgets can update the display every minute. That means widgets can show the correct date and time, but other information will have a 15-minute 'lag'.
trans-unit.source: Widgets can update the display every minute. That means widgets can show the correct date and time, but other information will have a 15-minute 'lag'.
trans-unit.target: Los widgets pueden actualizar la pantalla cada minuto. Eso significa que los widgets pueden mostrar la fecha y hora correctas, pero otra información tendrá un "retraso" de 15 minutos.

trans-unit.id: Widgy will automatically reload all live activities when switching to the app. You can also add a reload tap action to the live activity to make it reloadable on a simple tap. Thanks to iOS 17, the widget will reload in place.
trans-unit.source: Widgy will automatically reload all live activities when switching to the app. You can also add a reload tap action to the live activity to make it reloadable on a simple tap. Thanks to iOS 17, the widget will reload in place.
trans-unit.target: Widgy volverá a cargar automáticamente todas las actividades en directo al cambiar a la aplicación. También puedes agregar una acción de toque para recargar a la actividad en directo para que sea recargable con un toque simple. Gracias a iOS 17, el widget se recargará en su lugar.

trans-unit.id: iOS 18.1 has introduced dynamic recoloring of wallpapers, which is not compatible with Widgy’s transparency feature. To address this issue, please set your wallpaper using the shortcut provided below.
trans-unit.source: iOS 18.1 has introduced dynamic recoloring of wallpapers, which is not compatible with Widgy’s transparency feature. To address this issue, please set your wallpaper using the shortcut provided below.
trans-unit.target: iOS 18.1 ha introducido la recoloración dinámica de fondos de pantalla, lo cual no es compatible con la función de transparencia de Widgy. Para solucionar este problema, por favor configura tu fondo de pantalla usando el atajo que se proporciona a continuación.

trans-unit.id: iPad users, take note! Widgets don't know the orientation of your device. In other words, you can have transparency either for portrait or landscape orientation BUT NOT FOR BOTH. Rotating your device will break the illusion of transparency.
trans-unit.source: iPad users, take note! Widgets don't know the orientation of your device. In other words, you can have transparency either for portrait or landscape orientation BUT NOT FOR BOTH. Rotating your device will break the illusion of transparency.
trans-unit.target: Usuarios de iPad, ¡tomen nota! Los widgets no conocen la orientación de su dispositivo. En otras palabras, puede tener transparencia tanto para orientación vertical como horizontal PERO NO PARA AMBAS. Girar su dispositivo romperá la ilusión de transparencia.
